exercises.raw: Planks: 3 sets x 25 (60) sec x Bodyweight
exercises.name: Planks

exercises.raw: #26: Chest Press: adj#1: 1 set x 15 reps x 70 lbs, 1 set x 10-12 (15) reps x 80 lbs, 1 set x 10 (12) reps x 90 lbs, 1 set x 10 (12) reps x 100 lbs … 1 min rest (use top handle, breathe out when you push out, keep abs tight… bellybutton to spine)
exercises.notes: use top handle, breathe out when you push out, keep abs tight… bellybutton to spine

exercises.raw: #24: Wide Lat Pull: adj#2: 1 set x 15 reps x 80 lbs, 2 sets x 12 (15) reps x 90 lbs (thumbs in the corner and over the top, lean back 20 degrees and pull down to your collarbone, squeeze between your shoulder blades)
exercises.notes: thumbs in the corner and over the top, lean back 20 degrees and pull down to your collarbone, squeeze between your shoulder blades

exercises.raw: Bicycle abs: 3 sets x 15 (60) sec x Bodyweight (tuck hands under chin, raise shoulder blades, keep abs tight and pedal legs)
exercises.name: Bicycle abs
exercises.notes: tuck hands under chin, raise shoulder blades, keep abs tight and pedal legs

exercises.raw: #28: Leg Press: adj#4: 1 set x 15 reps x 90 lbs, 1 set x 10 (15) reps x 120 lbs, 1 set x 10 (15) reps x 140 lbs … 1 min rest (bring legs down to 90 degrees, don’t lock out knees, push through your heels)
exercises.notes: bring legs down to 90 degrees, don’t lock out knees, push through your heels

exercises.raw: #9: Incline Chest Press: adj#2/7: 3 sets x 15 reps x 50 lbs … 1 min rest
Seated Bicep Hammer Curls: 3 sets x 15 reps x 15 lbs
exercises.name: Seated Bicep Hammer Curls

exercises.raw: #34: Decline Ab Twist: adj#4: 3 sets x 10 (20) reps x 8 lb med ball (lean back, chest out, eye contact in mirror, twist torso, tighten abs as you exhale)
exercises.notes: lean back, chest out, eye contact in mirror, twist torso, tighten abs as you exhale

exercises.raw: #20: Pec-Fly: 3 sets x 10 (20) reps x 50 lbs … 1 min rest (think outside chest to inside of chest)
exercises.notes: think outside chest to inside of chest

exercises.raw: #13: Tricep Pushdowns/Pulldowns: 3 sets x 15 reps x 60/50 lbs … 1 min rest (palms down, thumbs on top, knees bent, push down and roll knuckles to thighs)
exercises.notes: palms down, thumbs on top, knees bent, push down and roll knuckles to thighs
